MEAN Stack Development Course

MEAN Stack Development course is designed so that, you’ll become a proficient MEAN-stack developer by mastering the MEAN stack – MongoDB, Express.js, Angular, and Node.js. Learn how to build dynamic web applications and APIs, create interactive user interfaces, and manage data seamlessly. Whether you’re a beginner or an experienced developer, this course equips you with the skills to develop modern web applications from start to finish.

MEAN Stack Development Course Details:

Introduction to MEAN Stack Development

  • Understanding the MEAN Stack
  • Advantages of MEAN Stack
  • Role of MongoDB, Express.js, Angular, and Node.js
  • Setting Up the Development Environment

MongoDB – The NoSQL Database

  • Introduction to MongoDB
  • Data Modeling in MongoDB
  • CRUD Operations
  • Aggregation Framework
  • Connecting Node.js with MongoDB

Building a RESTful API with Node.js and Express.js

  • Introduction to Node.js
  • Creating RESTful APIs
  • Handling Requests and Responses
  • Middleware and Routing
  • Error Handling

Developing Dynamic Web Applications with Angular

  • Introduction to Angular
  • Components and Modules
  • Data Binding and Event Handling
  • Services and Dependency Injection
  • Routing and Navigation

Creating Single-Page Applications (SPAs)

  • Building SPAs with Angular
  • Client-Side Routing
  • State Management and Observables
  • User Authentication and Authorization
  • Real-time Data Updates with WebSockets

Connecting Angular with Node.js and Express.js

  • Integrating Angular with Express.js
  • Authentication and Security
  • Consuming APIs in Angular
  • Handling Forms and User Input
  • Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS)

Advanced Topics in MEAN Stack Development

  • File Upload and Storage
  • Testing and Debugging
  • Performance Optimization
  • Deployment Strategies
  • Best Practices in MEAN Stack Development

Real-world MEAN Stack Projects

  • Building a Blogging Platform
  • Developing an E-commerce Application
  • Interactive Social Media Application
  • Capstone Project and Presentation

Course Duration:

  • 3 Months – Monday – Friday
  • Daily 2 Hrs
  • Week End Extra Practice
  • Career Guidance sessions
  • Week End Batches are also available.

Course Benefits:

  • Hands-on coding exercises and real-world projects
  • Access to MEAN stack development tools and libraries
  • Quizzes and assessments for tracking progress
  • Support from an online community forum
  • Course completion certificate

Prerequisites: Participants should have a basic understanding of HTML, CSS, JavaScript and web development concepts. This course is designed for developers with some prior programming experience.

Who can do this course:

  • Web developers looking to master full-stack development
  • Front-end developers eager to expand their skills
  • Backend developers interested in building interactive front ends
  • Anyone seeking a comprehensive understanding of the MEAN stack
